# isBypassingColorSpaceConversionSupported

**Type Property**

Whether the external display supports bypassing color space conversion.

## Declaration

```swift
class var isBypassingColorSpaceConversionSupported: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

If `true`, you may instantiate a configurator with a configuration specifying [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureExternalDisplayConfiguration/bypassColorSpaceConversion] set to `true`.

## Determining configuration support

- **isMatchingFrameRateSupported**: Whether the external display supports matching frame rate to a capture device.
- **isPreferredResolutionSupported**: Whether the external display supports configuration to your preferred resolution.
